name: P16
prompt: Security camera footage from elevated wide-angle camera mounted on garage, suburban home driveway and front yard at dusk. Fading natural light mixed with activated porch lights, long shadows. An unfamiliar dark sedan, license plate visible, tinted windows, parks in driveway. Vehicle pulls into driveway, person exits and walks toward the front door. Fixed camera position, wide field of view covering driveway and street approach, slight barrel distortion at edges, Transitional lighting quality, warm tones, automatic exposure adjusting. Realistic human motion, 20-second duration.
